channel.title: Moar Factory Version 0.7.0 crashes ModLoader
channel.description:
tried to update mod from 0.6 to 0.7 and got this :
Mod is crashing "Your are missing SID_p in your install!...."
SML Version: 1.0.2 Game Version: 106504
dll and pak/sig are in the right folders
what is wrong ?

item.title: Moar Factory Version 0.7.0 crashes ModLoader
item.dc:creator: @Daniel_S Daniel S
item.description:
@Daniel_S wrote:

It`s not mentioned ?

Installation and Infos

  1. IMPORTANT!!! First, Download and install the latest version of SML
  2. Download the MoarFactory Mod and unpack the Files
  3. Delete the JSON File. You don’t need it
  4. Copy/paste, Move the…
  • MoarFactory_p.pak
  • MoarFactory_p.sig to \SatisfactoryEarlyAccess\FactoryGame\Content\Paks
  • MoarFactory.dll to \SatisfactoryEarlyAccess\FactoryGame\Binaries\Win64\mods

Read full topic

item.title: Moar Factory Version 0.7.0 crashes ModLoader

item.description:
@TBNRregs wrote:

Wondering how many people dont read that they also need the SID

Read full topic

item.title: Moar Factory Version 0.7.0 crashes ModLoader
item.dc:creator: @Knowen Knowen
item.description:
@Knowen wrote:

Hey,

you need to install the SatisfactoryItemDictionary (SID) Mod.

Cheers,
Knowen

Read full topic
